long_description: With a small but sweet frame, the SunCloud Wisp polarized sunglasses are full of active details to keep your eyes comfortable and protected throughout the day. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Tortoise frames feature polarized brown lenses to eliminate glare and enhance contrast in bright conditions. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-SunCloud features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Designed to fit small faces.
short_description: With a small but sweet frame, the SunCloud Wisp polarized sunglasses are full of active details to keep your eyes comfortable and protected throughout the day.
